properties.body:
EASTERN CARIBBEAN SEA.
ANTIGUA AND BARBUDA.
75 FOOT M/V DISTANCE RUNNER, GREY HULL, THREE PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE NORTH OF
REDONDA (16-56.3N 062-20.5W). VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, INMARSAT-C: 422799024,
TELEX: 42912008, PHONE: 596 596 709 292, FAX: 596 596 632 450,
E-MAIL: ANTILLES@MRCCFR.EU.
